entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who hates certain people and has a complex relationship with Voldemort. He is also referred to as Professor Snape.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone Snape hates, implying that Sirius was a person of importance or significance in the story.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who interpreted the prophecy and is believed to be convinced that Snape is on his side.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who trusts Snape completely.

relationships.description: Voldemort believes that Snape is on his side.
